title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 337.28 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 337.28 - Application

State Regulations

Applications for such leaves of absence shall be made to
the chief administrative officer. Each such application shall include a
statement of the purpose for which the leave is requested, its anticipated
duration and its value to the applicant and the university. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
337.28

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
